content: make a beautiful and easy cup sleeve for your iced drinks no more wet tables this sleeve includes a bottom making it perfect to pull up over your cup tested cups included cups with a 2 5 diameter base the pattern was tested by a dozen amazing crocheters we have tested with both sugar & cream cotton and ilt cotton thin cotton such as premier didn t produce the same results this is a beginner/intermediate-level pattern if you have not used the herringbone stitch before that is okay it is a very easy stitch to pick up if you can half_double_crochet and single_crochet you can herringbone half_double_crochet this pattern is worked in joined rounds note the ribbon leaves are not included in the instructions they are really just a piece of ribbon twisted once and folded on itself and glued down this pattern has been checked throughly but if you happen to find any errors the team didn t catch please send me a message you can find me at fb com/corinnascorner
